name: Idle Drift Kings
description:
SUMMARY
Idle Drift Kings is a top-down idle game with physics based drifting mechanics. Start your drifting career and earn reputation to buy upgrades and travel to new drift spots. Climb the ranks to become the next Idle Drift King!

PHYSICS BASED DRIFTING
One of the reasons that Idle Drift Kings stands out from other idle games is because of its Physics Based Drifting mechanics. This makes earning points and watching those numbers rise even more satisfying.

EARN REPUTATION ACTIVELY OR PASSIVELY
In Idle Drift Kings you can upgrade both your active and passive playstyle through many upgrades, including Tandem Drifters for both the players car and the automatic RC drift cars to earn much more reputation.

CLIMB THE RANKS
When it comes to the drift scene in Idle Drift Kings, there are 6 ranks with upgrades for each rank respectively. Earn the reputation for the rank and spend it on upgrades within that rank to earn reputation at a much faster rate. You can also prestige to reset your rank. Prestiging will give you a certain amount of Prestige Reputation depending on how many upgrades you've purchased for the 6 ranks. You can spend the Prestige Reputation on upgrades in the prestige shop.

CAR CUSTOMIZATION WITH GARAGE
Idle Drift Kings features a 24 car garage with many cars, patterns, wheel offsets and full color customization. Browse the shop and purchase cars and patterns with Drift Dollas and have them sent to your garage for customization.

LEADERBOARDS
Compare your personal stats with the rest of the Idle Drift Kings community.
